template.description: Show protein interactions for a particular protein.

template.name: AAD_GOidentifier2proteinInteractions1
template.description: Show protein interactions for proteins annotated with a particular GO identifier in a particular organism.

query.name: AAD_GOidentifier2proteinInteractions1
query.view: GOTerm.identifier GOTerm.name GOTerm.genes.name GOTerm.genes.organismDbId GOTerm.genes.proteins.primaryAccession GOTerm.genes.proteins.interactions.bait.primaryAccession GOTerm.genes.proteins.interactions.prey.primaryAccession GOTerm.genes.proteins.interactions.evidence.analysis.interactionDetection.name GOTerm.genes.proteins.interactions.evidence.analysis.publication.pubMedId GOTerm.genes.organism.name

template.name: AAD_genes2fasta
template.description: Output genes from a particular organism in a format suitable for creating a fasta database.

template.name: AAE_gene2Transcripts2
template.description: Show the predicted transcripts and the number of exons for a particular gene.

template.name: AAE_synonym2proteinInteractions1
template.description: For the protein product of a particular gene, show the proteins it has been shown to interact with, the confidence value assigned to this interaction, the interaction detection method and the publication for the experiment performed.

constraint.description: Show the protein interactions for the protein product of gene:

template.name: AAF_gene2exonTranscript1
template.description: Show the predicted transcripts and exons for a particular gene.

query.name: AAF_gene2exonTranscript1
query.view: Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.transcripts.exonCount Gene.exons.identifier

constraint.description: Show predicted transcripts and exons for gene:

template.name: AAG_gene2ProteinInteraction2Structure
template.description: For the protein product of a particular gene, show any proteins it has been shown to interact with and for these proteins any regions which have a Pfam domain with a predicted 3-D structure.

template.description: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

constraint.description: Show proteins for the gene:

template.description: For a particular Drosophila gene show any regions of it's protein for which there is a predicted 3-D structure.

template.description: Show genes located on a particular chromsome.

template.name: AAI_Pfam2proteinStructure1
template.description: Search for Drosophila proteins which contain a particular Pfam domain for which there is also a predicted 3-D structure.

constraint.description: Show the Drosophila proteins which contain Pfam domain: (and which also have a predicted 3-D structure for this region.)

template.name: AAI_gene2ChromosomeLocation1
template.description: Show the chromosome and the chromosome location of a particluar gene.

query.name: AAI_gene2ChromosomeLocation1
query.view: Gene Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.objects.start Gene.objects.end Gene.objects.strand

constraint.description: Show the chromosome and the chromosome location for gene:

template.name: AAJ_gene2ProteinStructure1
template.description: Search for genes whose proteins have regions for which there is a predicted 3-D structure. Give the location of the region on the protein and the structure details.

query.name: AAJ_gene2ProteinStructure1
query.view: Gene.name Gene.organismDbId Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.regions.sequenceFamily.name Gene.proteins.regions.objects.start Gene.proteins.regions.objects.end Gene.proteins.regions.structures

constraint.description: Show genes from:

template.name: AAJ_synonymGene2exonChromosomeLocations1
template.description: Show the chromosome location of the exons for a particular gene.

query.name: AAJ_synonymGene2exonChromosomeLocations1
query.view: Synonym.subject.name Synonym.subject.organismDbId Synonym.subject.chromosome.identifier Synonym.subject.exons.identifier Synonym.subject.exons.objects.start Synonym.subject.exons.objects.end Synonym.subject.exons.objects.strand

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location of the exons of gene:
from organism:

template.name: AAK_chromosomeLocation2geneSequence1
template.description: Show the chromosome location and sequence for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: AAK_chromosomeLocation2geneSequence1
query.view: Gene.objects.object.identifier Gene.objects.strand Gene.objects.start Gene.objects.end Gene.name Gene.identifier Gene.sequence.residues

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location and gene sequences for all genes from organism:

template.name: AAL_chromosomeLocation2genes1
template.description: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located between two points on a chromosome. Give the location of the exons.

query.name: AAL_chromosomeLocation2genes1
query.view: Chromosome.identifier Chromosome.exons.gene.name Chromosome.exons.gene.organismDbId Chromosome.exons.gene.identifier Chromosome.exons.transcripts.identifier Chromosome.exons.identifier Chromosome.exons.objects.start Chromosome.exons.objects.end Chromosome.exons.objects.strand

constraint.description: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located on chromosome:
between base:

template.description: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene.

template.description: Search for genes annotated with a particular GO term.

template.description: Show predicted orthologues between two organisms and their GO terms.

template.name: AAP_gene2orthologues1
template.description: Search for predicted orthologues for a particular gene:

query.name: AAP_gene2orthologues1
query.view: Gene Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.organism.name

template.name: AAQ_orthologues1
template.description: Show the predicted orthologues between two organisms.

constraint.description: Show the predicted orthologues between:

template.name: AAR_orthologues2transcripts1
template.description: Show the transcript identifiers for a particular gene and its predicted orthologues transcript identifiers.

query.name: AAR_orthologues2transcripts1
query.view: Gene Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.organism.name Gene.orthologues.subject.transcripts.identifier Gene.orthologues.evidence.analysis.algorithm Gene.orthologues.evidence.analysis.description

constraint.description: Show the transcript identifiers and orthologue transcript identifiers for gene:

template.name: AAS_phenotype2genesWithOrthologues
template.description: Search for genes with a particular RNAi phenotype and show the orthologues of these genes. (Note: RNAi phenotypes are currently only available for C. elegans).

constraint.description: Search for genes and their orthologues which have RNAi code:

template.name: AAT_RNAiwithOrthologues
template.description: Search for RNAi phenotypes for a particular gene and show the predicted orthologues for this gene. (Note: RNAi phenotypes are currently only available for C. elegans genes).

constraint.description: Search for RNAi phenotypes and predicted orthologues for gene:

template.name: AAU_phenotype2genes1
template.description: Search for genes with a particular RNAi phenotype. (Note: RNAi phenotypes are currently only available for C. elegans).

constraint.description: Search for gene with RNAi code:

template.name: AAV_Gene2RNAi
template.description: Search for RNAi phenotypes for a particular gene. (Note RNAi phenotypes are currently ony available for C. elegans).

constraint.description: Search for RNAi phenotypes for gene:

template.name: AAW_gene2CERNAi
template.description: Search for the C. elegans orthologue for a particular gene and its RNAi phenotype.

query.name: AAW_gene2CERNAi
query.view: Gene Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.orthologues.subject Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.name Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.property.RNAiCode Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.property.name

constraint.description: Search for C. elegans orthologues for gene:

template.name: AAX_genes2CERNAi
template.description: Show the C. elegans orthologue and RNAi phenotypes for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: AAX_genes2CERNAi
query.view: Gene Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.orthologues.subject Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.name Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.property.RNAiCode Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.property.name

constraint.description: Show C. elegans orthologues and RNAi phenotypes for organism:

template.name: Object_Synonym
template.description: Find an entry in the database using any identifier or synonym.
